entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:04 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 10:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
